ing: 6 cups baby spinach, rinsed and dried
1 red bell pepper, seeded and thinly sliced
n: New Twist To An Old Favorite
des: "Healthier than iceberg lettuce and tastier too.  Baby spinach makes a great replacement for the typical garden salad."
ins: In a large bowl, toss together the spinach, tomatoes, cucumber, radishes, feta and red pepper.  Top with dressing of choice and enjoy!
